mapper.insert: INSERT into tbl_member (uid, id, email, pwd, regist_dt, regist_by, domain) VALUES (#{uid}, #{id}, #{email}, #{pwd}, NOW(), #{registBy}, #{domain})
mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, id, email, pwd, domain, name, img, comment FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT m.uid, id, email, domain, name, img, comment FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE m.uid = #{uid}
SELECT m.uid, id, email, pwd, domain, name, img, comment FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE id = #{id}
